body: Story: MC guy gets rejected by FMC girl in high school, finds her on a prostitution site 10 years later. FMC (who is also now married) remembers MC as well. MC begs for some kind of skit play where they replay that confession scene except MC gets with FMC and they have rough sex. Afterwards, MC is super grateful thanks her and asks her to leave while his back is turned but she says they're already together. They go at it one more time
